resources.string: Access Retricas entire library with a premium subscription!\nGet all the filters we periodically add to make your photos more special.
Start your free 7-day trial. After trial ends,\n$4.99 / month

This subscription auto-renews at the end of each your term at $21.99, unless cancelled 24-hours in advance. The subscription fee is charged to your account at confirmation of purchase. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Setings. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed active period. By joining you accept our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, / Restore Purchases
